workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.016525283496465815 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.07418575166410696 --weight-decay 0.0007599564600135171 --lr 0.0004455416952234705 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 134691 --max-lr 0.0005152742133126378 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.11159205545598105 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.028748147996128126 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
